long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The WriteText.ai browser extension is a companion tool to the WriteText.ai add-ons for WooCommerce, Magento, and Shopify. The extension lets users easily mark text for rewriting and fact-checking right inside the product page for easier reviewing. All comments are automatically synchronized with the connected ecommerce backend.
